>
[Spike Launcher](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1171)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 156</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 or 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Built from the spiked tail of a [manticore](/Monsters.aspx?ID=294), a _spike launcher_ is designed to launch large, spear-like projectiles. A spike launcher is a _+1 striking weapon_. It's a distinct type of martial firearm that deals 1d8 piercing damage. It has the [backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [fatal aim d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=404), and [kickback](/Traits.aspx?ID=409) traits with a [range increment](/Deities.aspx?ID=98) of 120 feet and [reload 2](/Traits.aspx?ID=254). It uses the critical specialization of the [bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3) weapon group, rather than the firearm critical specialization.

<document level="2" id="action-960" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the tail of a manticore.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
